Ena Paribahan has the following regular routes from Dhaka: (Only Non-AC bus service is available)
 *Mymensingh
 *Netrokona
 *Jamalpur
 *Sherpur
 *Tangail

 Main Office of Ena Paribahan:
 Address: House# 23, Road# 8, Block# A, Mirpur-12, Dhaka-1206.
 Mobile: 01924-764571, 01716-131481.

 *** Ena Paribahan has counters at Mohakhali bus terminal, Kakoli, Banani and Tongi. Buses are departed from these counters.

 Departure Time from Dhaka:
 Mymensingh: 5:30 am and 5:30 pm
 Netrokona: 6:00 am and 6:00 pm
 Jamalpur: 6:30 am and 6:30 pm
 Sherpur: 7:30 am and 7:30 pm
 Tangail: 8:00 am and 8:00 pm
